briefdescription.para: Generate a temporary path with temp_directory_path and mkstemp.

detaileddescription.para: Unit test that tests execution of IPC calls without actually creating a separate process. This test is primarily intended to verify behavior of type conversion code that converts C++ objects to Cap'n Proto messages and vice versa.

The test creates a thread which creates a FooImplementation object (defined in ipc_test.h) and a two-way pipe accepting IPC requests which call methods on the object through FooInterface (defined in ipc_test.capnp).

briefdescription.para: Test ipc::Protocol connect() and serve() methods connecting over a socketpair.
Test ipc::Process bind() and connect() methods connecting over a unix socket.
